name: qwak
description: Definition and parser for qwak, a simple but expressive minimal ascii dialect for programming step-based web audio event sequences

scripts.test: multi='mocha-osx-reporter=- dot=-' mocha --compilers js:babel/register -s 10 test/*.test.js --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run build && npm run docs

author: Adam Renklint <adam@renklint.com> (http://adamrenklint.com)
